rules: Use 'Nunito' for all headings to convey warmth and friendliness.
Use 'DM Sans' for body text for high readability.
Use 'Caveat' sparingly for 'handwritten' notes or impact numbers to add a human touch.
Headings must never be pure black; use slate-900 or a deep brand blue.

primary.description: Warm Coral - Used for primary CTAs (Donate) and key highlights.

secondary.description: Compassionate Blue - Used for trust indicators, links, and secondary actions.

accent.description: Sunny Yellow - Used for progress bars, badges, and cheerful accents.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-bold shadow-lg shadow-primary/20 transition-all hover:-translate-y-0.5
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-secondary border-2 border-secondary/20 hover:border-secondary hover:bg-secondary/5 rounded-full px-6 py-2.5 font-semibold transition-all
buttons.ghost: text-slate-600 hover:text-primary hover:bg-primary/5 rounded-lg px-4 py-2 font-medium transition-colors

cards.orphanage: bg-white rounded-2xl border border-stone-100 shadow-card hover:shadow-card_hover transition-all duration-300 overflow-hidden group
cards.stat: bg-white/60 backdrop-blur-sm rounded-xl border border-stone-200/50 p-6 hover:bg-white transition-colors
cards.donation: bg-white rounded-2xl border-2 border-primary/10 p-6 hover:border-primary/30 transition-colors

inputs.default: h-12 rounded-lg border-stone-200 bg-white px-4 text-base focus:border-primary focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 transition-all
inputs.search: h-14 rounded-full border-stone-200 bg-white pl-12 pr-4 shadow-sm focus:border-primary focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20

public_pages.description: Use asymmetrical grids for impact stories. Mix large hero images with smaller stat blocks.

dashboards.description: Dense, functional grids for data. Use 'bento' style boxes for metrics.

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle grain or paper textures on backgrounds to reduce digital coldness.
visual_enhancers.illustrations: Use 3D clay-style or flat, warm vector illustrations for empty states.
visual_enhancers.micro_interactions: Buttons scale slightly on click. Cards lift on hover. Progress bars fill with a smooth ease-out animation.

hero_children.alt: Diverse children playing in a field of flowers

volunteers.usage: About us or 'Become a Volunteer' section

impact_joy.alt: Child with colorful powder on face smiling

assets.icons: Use 'Lucide React' with rounded stroke endings (stroke-linecap='round').

accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text meets WCAG AA standards. Use APCA for critical text.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings (ring-2 ring-primary/50) on all interactive elements.

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic 'Lorem Ipsum'. Use realistic charity copy (e.g., 'Help provide 30 meals today').
Avoid pure black (#000000). Use #1E293B or similar dark slate.
Never use transparent backgrounds for dropdowns or overlays without a blur/scrim.
All interactive elements must have a 'data-testid' attribute.
Use 'recharts' for data visualization in dashboards.
